main event: One pink object, shaped like a streak, was observed heading south and disappeared in an upward direction, observed for ten minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at dusk, which may have influenced the object's color., The winds were reported to be southerly at the estimated altitude of the object., It was concluded that the object was likely a balloon., The report mentions insufficient data for a definitive classification of the object., One round, yellow and white object was also reported in a different instance heading southwest on the same date.
sighted object: one pink object shaped like a streak
